name: Damaged Space EDEN
description:
This is EDEN, a platforming puzzle game based in the Damaged Space universe.

STORY: "You are a researcher on EDEN, a distant research facility on another planet has experienced a number of failures on the facility that you must repair. Repair the systems, and save EDEN if you can. Beware of the strong winds, and the environment."

Gameplay: EDEN features an interactive puzzle that you have to solve in order to progress in the game. EDEN has one single level with multiple parts that you must complete in order to get to the final puzzle.

-=-=-=-NOTE-=-=-=-

My Submission for the "🌷 Great Spring Game Jam: 2021 🌷" by Firith Studio and Goodgis.
